name: Trusty Dungeon
description:
move with W A S D collect Keys and find the Exit,Shoot with UP, LEFT, RIGHT, DOWN, klick the green guy with your mouse.

i fyou collect the Key The door tile will open(the door tile is the thing the green Guy showes you)

Topic explanation:

some time you can Trust the Green Guy and some time he is lying to you.

I had no time to finish the game so you can play with main mecanics ... but try your self.

When the Jam will be over i will Uploade a Final/Finished Version.

Made by Me :)
